text: “apagē deviyanē! (apagē paramparāven vū) ovunṭa obagē āyāvan samudīraṇaya kara penvā, dharmayada gnānayada ovunṭa uganvā dī, ovunva pariśuddha kara tæbiya hæki rasūlvarayeku ovungenma ovun atarē ikut vīmaṭa salasvanu mænava! niyata vaśayen obama imahat bala sampannayeku hā itāmat nuvanættekuda vaśayen siṭinnehiya” (yayida prārthanā kaḷaha)
